about_the_game:
Why not also check out our other title - A Non-VR Narative Adventure!



Stocksynd House isn't just a game—it's a journey through the unsettling, the uncanny, and the unexplained. As a narrative-focused VR escape-room experience, it doesn't rely on cheap thrills. Instead, it weaves an intricate horror tapestry that envelops and disorients, daring you to unravel its mysteries while questioning everything, including your own senses.

Awakening in darkness, you're compelled to navigate through a shifting house of hidden horrors, each room presenting another enigmatic piece of a larger, more sinister puzzle. Is your unseen guide a protector, or something far more malevolent? Every choice and every step could lead you closer to clarity—or deeper into madness.

What sets Stocksynd House apart isn't just its emphasis on story and atmosphere over jump scares, but also its commitment to a truly immersive, claustrophobic environment. Every shadow feels alive, every sound a whisper from the unknown, all rendered in stunning, photorealistic detail.

Game Features:

  • A haunting, psychological narrative that evolves with your decisions.
  • Clever, challenging puzzles that weave seamlessly into the story.
  • Dynamic, responsive environments that react to your presence.
  • Photorealistic graphics with meticulously crafted atmospheric elements.
  • Hundreds of interactive items and physics-based challenges.
  • Intuitive Locomotion system with optional comfort mode, ensuring an immersive experience for all players.
  • Flexible play styles, accommodating both seated and standing positions.
  • Hidden secrets scattered throughout, rewarding exploration and curiosity.
  • SyndBox Mode, extending gameplay with creative, physics-based fun.

SyndBox Mode:

Extend your stay in "Stocksynd House" with SyndBox mode, a continuously updated playground that lets your imagination run wild. Interact with intriguing contraptions, experiment with game physics, and lose yourself in endless exploration!

Praise for "Stocksynd House":

"More than a game, an unforgettable haunting journey."
"Immersive, detailed, and resonantly eerie."
"Brilliantly avoids clichés, masterfully building tension and atmosphere."
"A narrative masterpiece draped in shadow and mystery."
"A unique blend of psychological horror and compelling storytelling."

Perfect for VR Beginners and Veterans Alike:

Whether you're new to VR or a seasoned aficionado, "Stocksynd House" offers a deeply engaging, intuitive experience. It's the perfect game to share with friends and family, inviting them into a world that's as fascinating as it is terrifying. Will they brave through the entire story, or hesitate at the threshold of the unknown? There's only one way to find out...

Join us in "Stocksynd House." Uncover the truth that lurks in the dark. The door is open. Are you ready to step inside?

content_descriptors.notes: Stocksynd House takes place in an unpredictable environment with creepy events taking place around you.

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Stocksynd House offers a narrative-driven VR experience, redefining the 'escape the room' genre. Eschewing jump scares for psychological intensity, it immerses players in an unsettling atmosphere of isolation, testing the limits of your psyche
